name: flip-card
author: TejaswaniRai
preview: An interactive flip card component with smooth 3D animations, supporting hover and click flips, customizable content, and responsive design.

props.name: frontImage
props.description: URL of the image to display on the front side

props.name: frontTitle
props.description: Title text to display on the front side

props.name: backContent
props.description: Content to display on the back side (can be text or JSX)

props.name: buttons
props.description: Array of button objects with 'text' and 'onClick' properties

props.name: iconLinks
props.description: Array of icon link objects with 'icon' and 'url' properties

props.name: gradient
props.description: Whether to apply a gradient background to the front side (default: false)
